nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, the Confederacy of Independent Systems built a mine on the planet of Mokivj to mine cortosis, which was used to build armored battle droids that could resist lightsabers. The material went to the droid factory on the planet, where it was used in B2-series super battle droids.
Jedi General Anakin Skywalker destroyed the mine in 19 BBY, with catastrophic results for the planet.

When Count Dooku of the Confederacy of Independent Systems received a tip from a mysterious species that cortosis could resist lightsabers, and was located on Mokivj, Dooku dispatched Duke Solha as well as his brother and sister. They took over the planet and established a mine on the planet, and soon, a droid factory.
The cortosis mine first appeared in the 2018 novel Thrawn: Alliances by Timothy Zahn.
